name: genie-api
description: Endpoints and associated functionality to create a cloud version of GenieHub

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name GenieAPI --runtime nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://genie-api.zip --handler ./build/index.api
scripts.aws-us: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name GenieAPI --zip-file fileb://genie-api.zip --profile genie-hub-active --region us-west-1 --no-cli-pager
scripts.create-us: aws lambda create-function --function-name GenieAPI --runtime nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://genie-api.zip --handler ./build/index.api --profile genie-hub-active --role arn:aws:iam::199352526440:role/genie_renderer --region us-west-1

author: Dynamic Array Ltd
